suncertify
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.Configuration
public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the persistent application configuration in an object-oriented manner. The configuration key/value pairs of hostname and database file path are stored as string variables within the class.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gregory Biegel

          Class constructor specifying the database file and hostname.

          Gets the value of the configured database file.
 java.lang.String getHostname()

Method Detail

public java.lang.String getDatabaseFile()
